Tagger
Class RuleTagNamedEntityRecognizer

java.lang.Object
  Tagger.RuleTagNamedEntityRecognizer

public class RuleTagNamedEntityRecognizer
extends java.lang.Object

Apply orthographical rules to recignize Gen entity. rules set: --length of single word --capital char besides the first char --whether exist some special symbol, like -,.,(,) --whether a mix of letters and digits
